Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;spirits^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 干得好！现在让我们来学习最后一项知识吧！
Texts.Eng: Nice work! Now, we'll have one last recipe to do.

So *hic* with all these mashed fruits we're ready to make some ^green;shpirits^white;. You'll need some ^orange;Yeast Water^reset; and ^orange;Water^reset; too. Bring all to the ^green;distiller^reset; and do yer magic! *hic*
